meanings: even if one dies and then wakes up[revives/blossoms] ten times
even if one dies and then wakes up[revives/blossoms] ten times
A living (person's) mouth would not be cobwebbed , Everyday brings its bread with it

meanings.meaning: We can live without a brother, but not without friends.
Even if I live this life again now.

vlive.korean: 이렇게 맘대로 살아도 되는 걸까? Can we live like this? Doing whatever we want? 듣기 View video 컨버전스티비 (CONS TV) : 몽슈슈 글로벌하우스 Ep7. [비온다고 나대지 말기!]
vlive.english: Can we live like this? Doing whatever we want?

vlive.korean: 근데 또 어차피 한 번 사는 인생 미세먼지 좀 마시면서 살아도 뭐 큰일 나겠어요? But would something terrible happen if I breathed in some fine dust? 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [루다] 생일 전야제🎂🎉
vlive.english: But would something terrible happen if I breathed in some fine dust?

vlive.korean: "남친 없이 살아도..." if I can live without my boyfriend". 듣기 View video BTS : BTS Live : 내가 왔다!
vlive.english: if I can live without my boyfriend".

vlive.korean: 혼자 살아도 외롭지 않아요. Although I live alone. 듣기 View video V Beauty : [연두콩의 이지뷰티] 헤어에센스 헤어오일 리뷰 Hair Essence & Hair Oil
물속에 살아도 재밌겠다. It'd be fun to live inside the water. 듣기 View video 졸잼티비 (joLjamTV) : [캐남] 하늘을 날고, 바다를 걷고_14회
vlive.english: It'd be fun to live inside the water.
